name: CV Demo Importer
author: CodeVibrant

sections.description:
Import “CodeVibrant” every official themes by only a single click. Simple installation and activation of all required plugins at occurrence. Import all the customization options, theme settings, widgets of official themes in a simplicity way.

Requirements

  • WordPress 4.7 or later.
  • CodeVibrant Official Themes.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin from WordPress.org repository
  2. On your WordPress admin dashboard, go to ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin’
  3. Upload the downloaded plugin file (cv-demo-importer.zip) and click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate ‘CV Demo Importer’ from your Plugins page.
  5. Use CV Demo Importer on any themes from codevibrant to import demo.

Credits

WordPress Importer by wordpressdotorg
URL: https://github.com/WordPress/wordpress-importer
License : GPL 2.0

Widget Importer & Exporter by ChurchThemes.com
URL: https://github.com/churchthemes/widget-importer-exporter
License : GPL 2.0

Customizer Export/Import by The Beaver Builder Team
URL: https://github.com/fastlinemedia/customizer-export-import
License : GPL 2.0
sections.installation:
1. Login to your WordPress Admin Area
    1. Go to Plugins > Add New
    2. Type “CV Demo Import” into the Search and hit Enter.
    3. Find this plugin Click “Install now”
    4. Activate The Plugin
    5. Use CV Demo Importer on any themes from codevibrant to import demo.
sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under the GPL license.

What themes this plugin supports?

  • The plugin currently only supports CodeVibrant official themes.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

*Added – fixed new theme’s demo compatible.

1.0.5

  • Fixed – various functions to manage the demo import from the targeted file path.
  • Fixed – css design of popup section.

1.0.4

  • Added – prefix for recommended functions and variables.
  • Fixed – text domain for recommended strings.

1.0.3

  • Update – 6.5 compatibility
  • Fixed – fatal error in customizer class.

1.0.2

  • Fixed – issue listed by plugin review admin.

1.0.1

  • Fixed – issue listed by plugin review admin.
